mapper.select: select ITEMS.PROD_ID, ITEMS.TITLE, ITEMS.IMAGE_URL, ITEMS.MIN_PRICE, USER_ITEM_LIST.WISH_PRICE, ITEMS.REG_DATE, ITEMS.LINK from ITEMS right join USER_ITEM_LIST on ITEMS.PROD_ID = USER_ITEM_LIST.PROD_ID inner join USERS on USER_ITEM_LIST.UNO = USERS.UNO where USER_ITEM_LIST.UNO = #{userNo} and USER_ITEM_LIST.PROD_ID = #{prodId}

select ITEMS.PROD_ID, ITEMS.TITLE, ITEMS.IMAGE_URL, ITEMS.MIN_PRICE, USER_ITEM_LIST.WISH_PRICE, ITEMS.REG_DATE, ITEMS.LINK from ITEMS right join USER_ITEM_LIST on ITEMS.PROD_ID = USER_ITEM_LIST.PROD_ID inner join USERS on USER_ITEM_LIST.UNO = USERS.UNO where USER_ITEM_LIST.UNO = #{uNo} order by ITEMS.REG_DATE desc
select PROD_ID, TITLE, IMAGE_URL, MIN_PRICE, LINK, REG_DATE from ITEMS order by REG_DATE desc
mapper.insert: insert into ITEMS (PROD_ID, TITLE, IMAGE_URL, MIN_PRICE, LINK, REG_DATE) values (#{pId}, #{title}, #{image}, #{min_price}, #{link}, #{reg_date})
insert into USER_ITEM_LIST (UNO, PROD_ID, WISH_PRICE, REG_DATE) values (#{no}, #{pId}, #{wPrice}, #{rDate})
